attributes.action: ALL ROAD CHARGES FOR THE DISABLED TO BE FREE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE NEW ROAD CHARGES SHOULD BE FREE FOR THE DISABLED MOTORIST. IT IS NOT THERE FAULT THAT THEY HAVE A DISABILITY.IF THE NEW ROAD CHARGES START THE DISABLED WILL BE CRIPLED EVEN MORE.

rejection.details: please re-submit with the capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
